posts.post_content:
Another nice batch of T206's for sale in higher grade. Price below includes shipping. PayPal via gift or money owed preferred. 
Just drop me an email if you see one you like. Thanks all, Tony

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

Psa 5.5 - Clyde Milan - off to Ebay
Sgc 70 - Bill Hallman (Old Mill) - *SOLD*
Sgc 70 - Harry MCintyre Brooklyn & Chicago (Old Mill) - *SOLD*
